el:english.el:comment: This is loosely based on The Lone Ranger.

el:string.el:english: Your faithful friend Tonto, your horse Silver, and Tonto's horse Scout have been captured.

el:english.el:comment: The glasses represent the mask the Lone Ranger used to hide his real identity.

John Reid is the real name of the Lone Ranger. When five of his friends were killed, he was left for dead. He buried them, and made a sixth empty grave for himself, so everyone else thought he was dead too.

el:string.el:english: Here lies the grave of John Reid.

el:english.el:comment: Said by the Lone Ranger as his horse Silver started galloping.
This was said at the end of most episodes of The Lone Ranger.
The tomb is empty because you faked your death.
